name: crudkit-example-products
title: CRUDKit E-commerce Products Example
description: Complete working example of e-commerce product catalog management with CRUDKit. Includes product schema with name, SKU, category, price, stock tracking, and status fields. Features 15+ mock products across 5 categories (Electronics, Clothing, Sports, Home, Books). Demonstrates inventory management, category filtering, stock tracking, pricing, and product status workflow (active, discontinued, out-of-stock). Perfect for building e-commerce admin panels, inventory management systems, and product catalogs.
